mapper.select:
select count(DEP_ID) as dayCount from biz_apply_gather
UPDATE_DATE between date(#{startDay}) and date(#{endDay})
group by DEP_ID
mapper.sql: apply_id, CAMPAIGN_ID, LIST_ID, DEP_ID, AREA_ID, CUST_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, commmethod, commcontent, CALL_ID, CALL_PHONE, LAST_OPUSER_ID, LAST_OP_CODE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_CODE, APPLY_CREATE_DATE, LAST_STATUS, STATUS, REASON, ENABLE, revised1, revised2, revised3, revised4, revised5, tmmgr_code, tsagt_code, EXPORT_TIME, TMAGT_SMIT_DATE, TMR_SMIT_DATE, TSAGT_SMIT_DATE, CHECK_RESULT, CRM_STATUS, CRM_DATE, CRM_USER_CODE, ASSIGN_FLAG, barcode, FAX_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from biz_apply_gather
order by ${orderByClause}
